direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods return direction-related information based on the specified CompassPoint, but return different types of data (full-size word vs. abbreviation).
Both methods return direction-related information based on the specified CompassPoint, but return different types of data (full-size word vs. azimuth).
Both methods handle data retrieval with similar control flows and exception handling, relying on the resolve method for data resolution.
The word method depends on the compassPoint method to determine the direction point, which influences the data retrieval process.
